channel.title: Gallery on Mary Fortuna - Detroit Michigan Artist
channel.description: Recent content in Gallery on Mary Fortuna - Detroit Michigan Artist

item.title: Collages
item.description: Collages describe a technique of pasting paper and other materials onto various surfaces. They can include other media such as painting and drawing and contain three dimensional objects.

item.title: Commissions and Kids Drawings
item.description: As the title suggests, a collection of collaborations, commissions, and kid’s drawings.

item.title: Mobiles & Hanging Sculptures
item.description: Installations, Mobiles, Hanging Sculptures. Interesting observations and figures.

item.title: Paintings
item.description: A collection of Mary Fortuna’s paintings.

item.title: Textiles
item.description: “As a textile artist, I love to work with all types of materials, but I particularly love working with silk, cotton, and wool. I use the fibers to create unique art that is both beautiful and functional. My fiber creations are all handmade, with each one being a unique piece of work.

item.title: Animals & Instincts
item.description: Creatures of the natural world have always intrigued Mary Fortuna. Always interested in our own behavior, she looks to animals and insects to learn of our own relationships and being.
